description.value:
When used by a Necron, all Necrons within 100m of a Resurrection Orb, including the user reroll all failed Toughness Tests and treat Regeneration Toughness Tests as +20.

Requirements

Used by Necron Lords and Overlords Always Best Quality. Xenotech.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
